description.narrative: Insatsen syftar dels till att påverka opinionen i EU-länderna och i ansökarländerna i positiv riktning för en fortsatt utvidgning av EU dels till att utveckla och stärka tankesmedjor som arbetar med denna fråga i ansökarländerna.

The aim of the project is to have an impact on the opinion in the EU member states and in the accession countries in a positive direction for a continued enlargement process. Another aim is to develop and strengthen think-tanks working with the same issues in the accession countries.

The goal of the project as defined in the agreement is: To influence and improve EU policy to bring about more effective convergence and integration in the Western Balkans, Turkey, and the Eastern neighbourhood; to have visible impact on public debates and help policy makers with innovative ideas and a better understanding of how to motivate reforms in a strategic region of Europe. To develop networks and skills of young policy analysts in the regions committed to empirical research, integrated into advocacy efforts of this project, with a special focus on EU accession and empirical research on issues of economic convergence. The aim of the project, as described in the 2nd addendum: "To to help defenders of liberal democracy in the Western Balkans and in Turkey, offering analysis based on research and specific policy recommendations. It is to meet the goals of the SIDA 2014-2020 strategy: to support EU integration, to strengthen democratisation efforts, to protect human rights and to promote balanced economic development. It is to help local actors to defend the rule of law, core principles of the European Convention of Human Rights and the EU’s basic treaty (“European values”).”

tag.narrative: 16.10 - 0 Säkerställa allmän tillgång till information och skydda grundläggande friheter, i enlighet med nationell lagstiftning och internationella avtal.
16.10 - Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements.
16.3 - Främja rättssäkerheten på nationell och internationell nivå samt säkerställa lika tillgång till rättvisa för alla.
16.3 - Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all.
16.8 - Broaden and strengthen the participation of developing countries in the institutions of global governance.
16.8 - Utvidga och stärka utvecklingsländernas deltagande i institutionerna för global styrning.

description.narrative: ESI har haft en en tydlig inverkan på debatterna de har valt att engagera sig inom. ESI-rapporten Hamster in the Wheel från 2019 bidrog till exempel till arbetet med Nordmakedoniens EU-anslutningsprocess, medan ESI -rapporten The Hypnotist - Aleksandar Vucic, John Bolton and the Return of the past var allmänt citerad och debatterad, vilket bedöms ha bidragit till det växande motståndet mot etniska gränsförändringar bland EU-ledare, bland annat av förbundskansler Angela Merkel. Mindre än två veckor efter att ESI publicerat sin rapport om rättsstatskrisen i Polen inledde EU - kommissionen, som ESI rekommenderat, överträdelseförfaranden mot Polen.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
